about_the_game:
The Assault Pack unlocks two new masks and two fresh weapon skin sets to jump into a new year of content with style. Purchase the Year 2 Pass and receive this pack as an instant reward.

The Assault Pack contains the following DLC:
- Vertex mask for Insurgents
- Mandible mask for Security
- Two-Tone Green Weapon Skin Set
- Universal Digital Weapon Skin Set

The Assault Pack is an Instant Reward for purchasing the Year 2 Pass for Insurgency: Sandstorm. Get ready for a new year of tactical and action-packed combat with tons of new cosmetic content headed your way!

The Assault Pack is an Instant Reward for purchasing the Year 2 Pass for Insurgency: Sandstorm. Get ready for a new year of tactical and action-packed combat with tons of new cosmetic content headed your way!

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Assault Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980/AMD Radeon R9 390X
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended.
